thread.title: Karen Matthews' ex-boyfriend's house overlooks playground
thread.title_full: Karen Matthews' ex-boyfriend's house overlooks playground

title: Karen Matthews' ex-boyfriend's house overlooks playground
text: Share this article Share He was allegedly beaten up by three men who had discovered his true identity and spotted him outside a local branch of Tesco. A family friend told MailOnline: 'He was just getting used to coming out again, going to the shops and the bookies, he was starting to get confident. 'Now that he's had a thumping at one of the places he felt safe at, he feels scared and he's gone reclusive again.' Karen Matthews' ex-boyfriend (pictured with Matthews in 2008) was jailed after police found child pornography on his computer during the investigation into Shannon Matthews' disappearance The new neighbours of the former fishmonger knew nothing about his past. Pictured is the house where Meehan is living Meehan was with Matthews, who has seven children by five different men, for five years before she was jailed over the plot with Meehan's uncle Michael Donovan to kidnap nine-year-old daughter Shannon. They lived on the Dewsbury Moor estate in West Yorkshire - just a mile from where Shannon was found in Batley Carr. Meehan was found guilty of possessing child pornography in 2008 and issued a 20-week jail sentence, but was released as he had already spent it in jail on remand. He was never charged in connection with Shannon's abduction. Meehan was with Matthews for five years before she was jailed over the plot with Meehan's uncle Michael Donovan to kidnap nine-year-old daughter Shannon (pictured) Read more: Share or comment on this article Most watched News videos
